textos_fuente.text: Dine at Calypso | Waterfront Inn Villages Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room 352.753.7535 1105 Lake Shore Dr The Villages, FL 32162 Book A Room Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room Calypso Welcome to Calypso, a bold Caribbean-inspired dining haven that brings the vibrant, sun-soaked flavors of the islands to the lakeside shores of Lake Sumter. With a warm, inviting atmosphere, Calypso offers guests an immersive island escape through a playful mix of tropical décor, radiant evening beats, and breezy dining delights. The indoor-outdoor bar lets you sip on taste-forward, rum-infused cocktails as you feel the lakeside breeze and gaze across the water. Subscribe to our Newsletter Hours Sunday through Thursday 11:30am – 9pm Friday through Saturday 11:30am – 10pm Happy Hour 11:30am – 5pm Contact 352-750-8265 calypso@waterfrontinnvillages.com Bold Caribbean Flair Our lively menu takes you on an adventurous, bold taste journey, with zesty island bites and flavorful dishes that celebrate Caribbean flair and global influences. Expect exotic ingredients, sunkissed atmosphere, and an enlivening dining experience crafted to satisfy all the senses. From laid-back acoustic tunes to energetic nightfall vibes, our lineup of local artists creates an ambiance that’s as dynamic and vibrant as the flavors we serve. At Calypso, every bite, sip, and beat is a celebration of Caribbean-inspired, lakeside bliss. View Food Menu View Cocktail Menu View Children's Menu Live Entertainment Calendar Celebrate Island Style Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or planning a group gathering, Calypso offers a vibrant, island-inspired space perfect for parties of 15 to 40 guests. Enjoy a fully customizable menu tailored to your taste, crafted with Caribbean flair. Booking is by inquiry only – let’s make your next event unforgettable! Inquire Here Privacy Policy Receive Our Newsletter Reservations 352-753-7535 Email Us 1105 Lake Shore Dr, The Villages, FL 32162 © 2025 The Waterfront Inn

Shop Courses Support Reviews Articles My Account/Login 0 items $0.00 Home > Customer Support Center Better education makes better professionals View My Courses Customer Support Center Customer satisfaction is our #1 priority! Let us know how we can improve your experience with our website, online course, or payment services. Email: support@calypsoedu.com Phone: (802) 565-8238 or (802) 565-1556 After hours, please feel free to leave us a voicemail or email, and we will respond within one business day. Mailing Address: American Continuing Education Institute, Ltd. dba, Calypso Continuing Education™ P.O. Box 176 Randolph, Vermont 05060 Contact our Sales Team Rachel, Enrollment Director (802) 565-1557 Rachel@calypsoedu.com Isaak, Enrollment Specialist (802) 565-1558 Isaak@calypsoedu.com Our sales team works on Eastern Time; please keep this in mind when contacting our team for inquiries about CE purchases. System Requirements Calypso Continuing Education™ courses work with most modern web browsers and operating systems. Our Recommendation: To get the best experience with our website and courses, we strongly recommend using Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome . You can download either browser for free using the preceding links. Apple’s Safari browser also works well. Internet Explorer is supported, though some students have reported display issues when using it. When using Internet Explorer , we recommend you update to the newest version available. Some of the additional educational materials available with our courses are supplied in PDF format. You will need a PDF reader, such as Adobe Acrobat, to view those resources. Acrobat Reader is free to download and install. We recommend an internet connection of 5Mbps (five megabits per second) or higher to view the Calypso Continuing Education™ Appraiser and Environmental courses. Slower connections may work, but the material may load more slowly and you may be disappointed with the performance. IMPORTANT: Why should you clear your web browser’s cache, cookies, and history? Instructional Support Our instructors are available to answer questions regarding course content. Participants may call (802) 565-1556 or email: support@calypsoedu.com Please allow up to one business day to receive a reply. Frequently Asked Questions Check here to see if other customers have already asked the questions you need answers to. Will Calypso courses run on my tablet? Calypso Continuing Education™ courses are designed using the most up to date web servers. Our courses will play on all systems. Some of the additional educational materials available with our courses are supplied in PDF format. You will need a PDF reader, such as Adobe Acrobat, to view those resources. Acrobat Reader is free to download and install. What if my videos won’t play? If you are not already using Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome we suggest changing to one of these browsers. Either can be downloaded free of charge using the preceding links. If you are using one of these browsers and you are experiencing difficulty, please consider clearing your browser’s history as this can greatly affect the way new webpages load to your system. If you are still experiencing difficulty, please call customer service at (802) 565-8238 or email support@calypsoedu.com How can I view state approvals? Every state is different. Please choose your profession to find courses approved in your state. Appraisal EPA MLO Real Estate All Appraisal and Real Estate courses are IDECC/ARELLO approved. Can I use bookmarks within a course? You can bookmark as many pages as you wish in a Calypso course. Simply click the blue Bookmark this Page at the top of the page you wish to bookmark.  After you add a bookmark, Bookmark this Page changes to Bookmarked and a bookmark indicator appears in the unit navigation bar at the top of the course page. To view your bookmarked pages, click on the course ‘Home‘ tab at the top of the course. You will see a list of Course Tools on the right-hand side of this screen.  Select Bookmarks to view a list of all bookmarked pages. For a detailed view of how bookmarks work you may wish to review the edX help center. What are my state requirements? Each state has different requirements.  Click your profession and then choose your state. Appraisal Real Estate Do you report credit completion? Calypso reports course completion weekly to states that require it. Please always retain a copy of your certificate of completion for your records. What are your policies, terms & conditions? View our policies . Are multiple certificates available? Additional state certificates are available for each state that you are licensed in at no additional cost. To print multiple certificates, go to your account settings and enter your additional state(s) information. Our system will generate your certificate(s) automatically. For assistance or if you have questions please call (802) 565-8238 or email support@calypsoedu.com . How long do I have to complete my course? After initial purchase you have six months to complete the course. In the event you require additional time, contact us by e-mail or telephone and we will grant more time at no additional cost. How do Calypso courses work? Our online courses are asynchronous, allowing you to work at your own pace. We include video content, poll questions, other interactive content, and reading material. What about exams? Calypso Continuing Education™ courses provide questions designed to test your mastery of the learning objectives and reinforce retention. To ensure you understand the important information supplied during the courses, we administer quizzes at the end of each chapter and an exam at the end of the course.* We have designed all quizzes and the exam to meet the following criteria: The conditional quizzes at the end of most chapters prevent you from moving forward to the next chapter until you have demonstrated sufficient mastery of the subject; The quizzes and exam contain a sufficient number of questions with a revolving pool of questions that are designed to test your mastery of the subject matter and reinforce the learning process; All questions, individually and collectively, test at a difficulty level appropriate to measure your achievement of the stated course learning objectives; Successful completion of the examination(s) requires you to answer a minimum of 70% of the questions correctly; Examination questions are written in a clear and unambiguous manner; and, The examinations are not proctored, but appraisers are required to complete an affidavit attesting they are the individuals accessing the course and completing all quizzes and exams. * In those states where an exam is not required for accreditation, the exams have been disabled. Will I receive completion certificate(s)? When you complete each course, the system will generate a certificate in Adobe PDF format, so you can print and/or save it. To generate multiple certificates for additional states please enter the license number and state name into the proper fields in your student account. Provided the course is complete, certificates will generate automatically using the added information when you re-open your course. You can print and/or save your certificate as many times as you wish. What are my State certificate requirements? Please check to see what information your state requires on your certificate . Support & FAQ | My Account | Affiliate Area American Continuing Education Institute, Ltd. dba: Calypso Continuing Education™ Copyright © 2013 - 2025 All rights reserved. 28 N. Main Street • Randolph, VT 05060 • 802.565.1556 • info@calypsoedu.com Policies Website by Downhill Media

About | Waterfront Inn Villages Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room 352.753.7535 1105 Lake Shore Dr The Villages, FL 32162 Book A Room Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room About The Luxurious Boutique That's a Longtime Favorite The southern charm was built into The Waterfront Inn, and our legacy has grown with every visitor who has enjoyed our hospitality. Our boutique hotel offers much more than spacious, upscale rooms appointed with all the modern amenities. Our well-manicured property offers stunning vistas of both Lake Sumter and Palmer Legends Championship Golf Course. Enjoy cocktail hour or treat yourself to a delectable dish at Calypso, our on-site restaurant. Unwind in the outdoor pool, soak in our whirlpool spa, or stroll down to Market Square to enjoy shopping and entertainment. From spending a single night's stay to hosting a full wedding reception or corporate event, The Waterfront Inn is ready to make your time here unforgettable. We've Taken Care of Everything Don't hesitate to let us know how we may make your stay more pleasurable. The staff of The Waterfront Inn is here to serve. Amenities Heated outdoor pool Whirpool outdoor hot tub Fitness center Mini-fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and safe in each room Complimentary WiFi TVs On-site restaurant, Calypso Market The Local Area Whether you drive, take a golf cart, or enjoy a leisurely stroll down to Lake Sumter Landing's Market Square, you'll find much to do in Florida's friendliest town. The three bustling town squares are filled with opportunities for dining, drinking, dancing, and shopping. In addition to the local area attractions, we are located within a short drive of many world famous entertainment options. Getting Here Whether you're flying into Florida or driving from somewhere more local, let us guide the way. When you get here, you can always count on complimentary parking in a well-lit lot. Learn More FAQ You've got questions, and we've got answers. Before calling, check out our Frequently Asked Questions to see if we can provide a quick solution. Are pets allowed? We allow dogs and cats at The Waterfront Inn. Dogs or cats must not weigh more than 55 lbs and must be domesticated. No more than two pets per room are allowed. There is a non-refundable pet charge of $75 for up to 7 nights and $125 for up to 14 days. Please contact our team for long-term stays. Pets may not be left unattended in rooms and pets are not permitted in Hotel restaurants or other Hotel food and beverage areas as well as the meeting rooms, the pool, and the fitness center. What is the hotels firearm policy? While The Waterfront Inn recognizes that hotel guests and visitors may legally possess firearms, we prohibit firearms on hotel property. This policy is intended to create a safe environment for all who visit The Waterfront Inn by providing appropriate guidance over the custody of firearms on the premises. Please keep in mind that the safety and security of hotel guests and patrons is of utmost importance. The Waterfront Inn prohibits persons from carrying or otherwise possessing a firearm on hotel property, including carrying firearms in an open or concealed manner. This policy applies to all firearms, regardless of whether the firearm is a handgun or long-barreled gun. The Waterfront Inn reserves the right to request guests and visitors who fail to abide by this policy to leave the hotel premises. Failure to leave at the request of the hotel may result in Police Department contact, and may subject you to further legal action for failure to abide by this policy, including trespass. This policy does not apply to on-duty law enforcement officers. Is there daily housekeeping? Housekeeping stayover service will be provided every other day of the guests stay or upon request. To request other special arrangements, please contact the Front Desk. If you prefer to simply to have your amenities refreshed, or trash or soiled towels removed and replaced, please notify Front Desk. In addition, room supplies, amenities and linen are always available to you 24/7 by simply contacting our Front Desk at extension “0”. How do I rent a golf cart? Call The Villages Golf Cart at 352.753.6750 to make a reservation. The rental facility is located within walking distance from The Waterfront Do you have any smoking rooms? The Waterfront Inn is a nonsmoking hotel. Is there valet parking? We do not offer valet parking; however, our surface parking lot on-site is complimentary. How can we set up a tee time? To reserve a tee time, call any of the Championship Course's clubhouses: Belle Glade 352.674.2700 Bonifay 352.753.1776 Cane Garden 352.751.7209 Evan's Prairie 352.205.8910 Glenview Champions 352.753.3345 Hacienda Hills 352.753.5155 Havana 352.750.8085 Lopez Legacy 352.753.1450 Mallory Hill 352.753.3730 Orange Blossom Hills 352.753.5200 Palmer Legends 352.753.5300 Tierra Del Sol 352.750.4600 Visit golfinthevillages.com for more information. Are there any rooms with separate bedrooms? We do not offer multi-room suites, but our spacious single rooms include the choice of a king bed or two queen beds. Is the pool heated? Yes, the temperature of the pool is always a comfortable 84 degrees or higher. What time does the pool and hot tub close? The pool and hot tub are open from 8 AM to 10 PM daily. Do you have a fitness center? Yes . What is your cancellation policy? Out of respect for others attempting to make reservations, we require cancellations to be made at least 48 hours in advance of your stay, and we will happily provide a full refund. Contact We're always ready to serve you. Feel free to contact us via email or pick up the phone and say hello. First Name * This field is required. Last Name * This field is required. Email Address * This field is required. Subject * This field is required. Message Submit Privacy Policy Receive Our Newsletter Reservations 352-753-7535 Email Us 1105 Lake Shore Dr, The Villages, FL 32162 © 2025 The Waterfront Inn

Lakefront King With Balcony | Waterfront Inn Villages Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room 352.753.7535 1105 Lake Shore Dr The Villages, FL 32162 Book A Room Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room Waterfront Inn Villages Rooms Current: Lakefront King With Balcony Book Live Like a King, With a Balcony and a View Lakefront Balcony rooms offer panoramic views of Lake Sumter and Palmer Legends Championship Golf Course, with all the amenities of a Lakefront King room, with a balcony to admire the scenery from. Retreat to your private room to fall into a king-sized bed with pillow-top mattress, and get cozy in a duvet that you could hibernate in. Comfy. Cozy. Charming. That's The Waterfront Inn's king experience. Walkout balcony to truly enjoy the view Pillow-top king bed with luxury linens, fluffy pillows, and comfortable duvets Complimentary high speed internet TV In-room Keurig coffee service with coffee and tea, microwave, mini-fridge, and safe In-room hair dryers, shampoo, body lotion, and soap Additional Room Options Lakefront Grand Suite Lakefront Grand Suites offer panoramic views of Lake Sumter and Palmer Legends Championship Golf Course. Book View Room Lakefront King Lakefront King rooms offer panoramic views of Lake Sumter and Palmer Legends Championship Golf Course. Book View Room Lakefront Double Queen With Balcony Lakefront Double Queen Balcony rooms offer panoramic views of Lake Sumter and Palmer Legends Championship Golf Course. Careers | Waterfront Inn Villages Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room 352.753.7535 1105 Lake Shore Dr The Villages, FL 32162 Book A Room Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room Work With Us on the Waterfront. Are you looking to grow with the best? We believe the hospitality we show our guests starts with the care we show our team members. In addition to a positive company culture and boundless opportunities for growth, we offer: hotel discounts at all of our AHC Hospitality hotels and restaurants, The Villages® employee discounts, eligibility for The Villages® Charter School, paid lunch breaks, 401K, full medical/dental/vision benefits (full-time employees only). Join our team and find the space where you can thrive. Current Openings Teammate Testimonial "What you find here is a hidden gem of hospitality nestled in a resort style community with a variety of dining and entertainment options right next door. For guests and your career, everything you need is right here. The all-inclusive feel from the physical property holds true with the staff and management. Warm and inviting are both hospitality traits that you will find in the Florida charm of the hotel and likewise in the personalities of the staff and leadership." Privacy Policy Receive Our Newsletter Reservations 352-753-7535 Email Us 1105 Lake Shore Dr, The Villages, FL 32162 © 2025 The Waterfront Inn

Waterfront Inn Villages Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room 352.753.7535 1105 Lake Shore Dr The Villages, FL 32162 Book A Room Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room Paradise Awaits You The Waterfront Inn is one of Florida's premiere hotel destinations for lovers of food, fun, and southern hospitality. It's the perfect place to get away from it all... or bring everyone together for a meeting or wedding. With an eclectic mix of shopping and entertainment just a block away, you can do it all at The Waterfront Inn. Even if that means simply enjoying a breathtaking sunset over Lake Sumter. Guest Rooms Soothed by the panoramic views. Pampered by the plush bedding. Each room includes everything you need to make an overnight stay or an extended visit both comfortable and unforgettable. Learn More Dine Calypso invites you to a vibrant, sun-soaked dining experience on picturesque Lake Sumter, where Caribbean flavor fusions and bold, fresh tastes come alive. Enjoy radiant rum-infused cocktails, and zesty bites in an atmosphere inspired by lively island vibes. With immersive, energizing music and a stunning lakeside setting, Calypso offers a refreshing take on bold, flavorful dining. Learn More Host Whether making your special wedding day even more special or turning a corporate meeting into an event to remember, The Waterfront Inn is the ideal host. Learn More Privacy Policy Receive Our Newsletter Reservations 352-753-7535 Email Us 1105 Lake Shore Dr, The Villages, FL 32162 © 2025 The Waterfront Inn

Host | Waterfront Inn Villages Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room 352.753.7535 1105 Lake Shore Dr The Villages, FL 32162 Book A Room Stay Dine at Calypso Meetings and Events Calendar About Careers Book a Room An Accommodating Host for Your Gathering Whether making your special wedding day even more extraordinary or turning a corporate meeting into an event to remember, The Waterfront Inn is the ideal host. Talk to our event planning staff about how we can take care of every detail of your upcoming meeting, luncheon, retreat, wedding, or other special occasion. Weddings The serene setting provides stunning views for your special day, but it's our staff that creates the real magic. When you choose The Waterfront Inn to host your wedding, our expert event planning team will walk you through every step of the process and take care of every detail. Photo Credit | Keptya Photography Learn More Meetings and Events Whether it's a corporate retreat, family reunion, professional conference, or any other occasion, The Waterfront Inn offers the perfect setting. Our on-site catering team will take care of all your needs, from breakfast to dinner. Our elegant rooms provide a private respite for those staying overnight. And our event management staff has the experience to anticipate your needs and outperform your expectations. Onsite Catering At any group event, it's all about food. From elegant evening dinners to casual retreat lunches, our catering team delivers inspired menu options and first class service. From breakfast to dinner and every coffee or snack break in between, let us make an impression on your group.
